mapper.select: SELECT a.salida, a.id_persona, a.cont, a.url, trim(CONCAT(b.nombre, ' ', ifnull(b.APELLIDO1, ""), ' ', ifnull(b.APELLIDO2, ""))) nombre FROM album a, persona b WHERE a.id_persona=b.id_persona order by salida, cont
SELECT * FROM album where salida=#{salida} and id_persona=#{id_persona}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO album (salida, cont, url, id_persona) VALUES (#{salida}, #{cont}, #{url}, (SELECT id_persona from persona WHERE socio=#{socio}))
